languages.text: Не работает, похоже механизм разрушен обстрелом

traits.locale_text: Не работает, похоже механизм разрушен обстрелом

languages.text: Открывающий механизм невозможно включить — он расплавлен ударом корабельного снаряда.
The unlocking mechanism cannot be activated — it has been completely melted by a shot from the flagship's weapons.
languages.original_text: Открывающий механизм невозможно включить — он расплавлен ударом корабельного снаряда.

traits.locale_text: The unlocking mechanism cannot be activated — it has been completely melted by a shot from the flagship's weapons.
The unlocking mechanism cannot be activated — it has been completely melted by a shot from the flagship's weapons.

The unlocking mechanism cannot be activated — it has been completely melted by a shot from the flagship's weapons.

languages.text: Der Entsperrungsmechanismus kann nicht aktiviert werden – ein Schuss aus den Waffen des Flaggschiffs hat ihn komplett geschmolzen.
languages.original_text: The unlocking mechanism cannot be activated — it has been completely melted by a shot from the flagship's weapons.

traits.locale_text: Der Entsperrungsmechanismus kann nicht aktiviert werden – ein Schuss aus den Waffen des Flaggschiffs hat ihn komplett geschmolzen.

languages.text: Impossible d'activer le mécanisme d'ouverture. Il a complètement fondu après un tir du vaisseau.
languages.original_text: The unlocking mechanism cannot be activated — it has been completely melted by a shot from the flagship's weapons.

traits.locale_text: Impossible d'activer le mécanisme d'ouverture. Il a complètement fondu après un tir du vaisseau.

languages.text: 解锁装置无法激活。这台装置遭到了旗舰的炮击，已经彻底熔化了。
languages.original_text: The unlocking mechanism cannot be activated — it has been completely melted by a shot from the flagship's weapons.

traits.locale_text: 解锁装置无法激活。这台装置遭到了旗舰的炮击，已经彻底熔化了。

languages.text: No es posible activar el mecanismo de desbloqueo; un disparo de la nave insignia lo ha fundido por completo.
languages.original_text: The unlocking mechanism cannot be activated — it has been completely melted by a shot from the flagship's weapons.

traits.locale_text: No es posible activar el mecanismo de desbloqueo; un disparo de la nave insignia lo ha fundido por completo.

languages.text: 解錠メカニズムが作動できない。旗艦の兵器による射撃で完全に溶けてしまっている。
languages.original_text: The unlocking mechanism cannot be activated — it has been completely melted by a shot from the flagship's weapons.

traits.locale_text: 解錠メカニズムが作動できない。旗艦の兵器による射撃で完全に溶けてしまっている。

languages.text: Kilit açma mekanizması, sancak gemisinin silahlarından ateşlenen bir mermi nedeniyle tamamen eridiği için etkinleştirilemiyor.
languages.original_text: The unlocking mechanism cannot be activated — it has been completely melted by a shot from the flagship's weapons.

traits.locale_text: Kilit açma mekanizması, sancak gemisinin silahlarından ateşlenen bir mermi nedeniyle tamamen eridiği için etkinleştirilemiyor.
